articles.author: Filip Timotija
articles.title: NASA chief calls for reported Musk-Putin talks to be investigated - The Hill
articles.description: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson called for The Wall Street Journal’s recent report on “secret” conversations between tech billionaire Elon Musk and Russian President Vladimir Putin to be investigated.  Nelson first emphasized that NASA is “non-partisan politic…
